attributes.action: Ex Pats with dual nationality must have a UK passport to enter the UK.
attributes.additional_details: This is an injustice to ex pats no longer living or working in the UK. Having a to pay £100-500 to enter the UK and will most likely never be used or needed again. Making other countries passport where you lived for 10-50 years invalid and unable to pay £19 for a travel visa like any other tourist. This is a government money making incentive to persecute ex pats visiting a place that once was their home.
attributes.background: Scrap the use of double passports to enter the UK on holiday. Ex pats now having to pay for a UK passport to enter the UK and can no longer use your dual nationalities passport.

rejection.details:
The petition title appears to request something which contradicts what the rest of the petition is calling for. 

You could submit a new petition setting out more clearly what you want the UK Government or Parliament to do regarding entry requirements for UK citizens with dual nationality.
